message.raw:
Updated NI PCI 6733 device to add features and fix bugs

 * Added manual control of PFI flags
 * Fixed bugs in BLACS worker process preventing use of digital outputs in experiments
 * Fixed bug in labscript code which demanded an even number of child devices, not an even number of AnalogOuts
 * Fixed bug in labscript code which had the incorrect dtype for the digital output numpy array. This caused an obscure "index out of range" error in a bitfield conversion.

  • Fixed bug in labscript code which had the incorrect dtype for the digital output numpy array. This caused an obscure "index out of range" error in a bitfield conversion.

message:
Updated NI PCI 6733 device to add features and fix bugs

 * Added manual control of PFI flags
 * Fixed bugs in BLACS worker process preventing use of digital outputs in experiments
 * Fixed bug in labscript code which demanded an even number of child devices, not an even number of AnalogOuts
 * Fixed bug in labscript code which had the incorrect dtype for the digital output numpy array. This caused an obscure "index out of range" error in a bitfield conversion.
